name: Lines On Sides
description:
A minimalist puzzle game with no tutorials. You have to figure out how to pass the level yourself. 

Your task is to arrange the tiles so that their sides match each other in colors. Black lines appear when the sides are properly arranged.

More levels are available on the App Store.

Thanks for playing. :) 
Michal

Controls: 
Mouse click - rotate tile.
Mouse click and drag - move tile.
